website_summaries.verdict: Used by many pros, this popular CB radio offers SSB and many other desirable features.
pros: Packed with excellent features and diagnostics
cons: No instant access to common channels

customer_reviews.title: Is it really NEW?
customer_reviews.text: Received the item timely. Took it to a CB shop to have its abilities "enhanced". CB was hooked up by the tech and I was told it didn't work. I assumed the unit was NEW but the tech observed a sticker on the back indicated it had been opened, refurbished and supposedly re-inspected. I received a prompt refund, but still disappointed in the whole process.
customer_reviews.author: Mike dobson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with it and it out performs other radios in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this radio for myself as a birthday gift. I had it peaked and tuned and got it up to 35 Watts. That's as high as it would go. So far I've been able to talk up to 15 miles and sounded clear on the other end. I'm very satisfied with it and it out performs other radios in its price range. If your looking for a good radio at a reasonable price this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: StephenCM

customer_reviews.title: I love my Galaxy DX-959B. Awesome radios. Great Amazon Experience. Two Thumbs Up !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for myself one for my friend. First one (the Gift) ordered was defective and missing parts. Returned replaced with another It is A OK. I also had a great experience with the RMA. Always buy from a trusted seller you will never regret it. The second one (Mine) works no issues I was very happy. I would buy again. Feature packed Radios. Gets out better than expected. I got out 20 Miles on AM first try, after setting SWR on a mobile Mag mount. I love My Galaxy DX-959B.
customer_reviews.author: Punkinoid

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the item, because the one that came first had a problem with LCD display - it was unable to be switched on easily (pressing the dimmer button didn't work always). When the replacement came - it came with a new problem! Now the blue display can be switched on or off normally by simply pushing the dimmer button, but once it is on the device starts emitting irritating high-frequency noise. So you need to switch off the display if you don't wanna hear that. They live you no choice but to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rx is iffy
customer_reviews.text: Tx is great, Rx comes and goes. Seems during the heat of the day I can't hear anybody but get a full incoming signal on the meter. This radio has issues.
customer_reviews.author: Phildo

customer_reviews.title: Love these CB radio
customer_reviews.text: Love these CB radio , easy to adjust and tweak , plenty of information online to adjust it. The only thing that I did not like is that it had a very low humming sound generated by the blue back light module , They could have used diode lights instead that do not make humming sounds . Yes you can stop the humming sound but it means unplugging the blue light module cable inside and no more button blue lights. But other than that it’s a great model since nothing inside is different from the regular white light model.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: first radio received was Junk
customer_reviews.text: 2 day old radio and it has frequency drop on the receive side. I can talk out clear as day, can’t understand a word anyone else is saying. UPDATE: Amazon sent out a replacement radio that has so far worked without issue. They do seem like a decent radio if you "get a good one"
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this in August of 2017 and it lasted 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in August of 2017 and it lasted 3 months and quit working. Took it to get repaired and couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: reba perry

customer_reviews.title: The radio has very poor noise filtering.
customer_reviews.text: I have this radio and several other cb radios. If you want a decent radio for mobile operation go with the bearcat 980ssb. The 980 is quieter than the galaxy. Galaxy radios are no better than cobra or uniden and they seem to have better filtering. than the galaxy.The older cb radios have better filters than the newer radios in general.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Total Junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these over the last year and both of them crapped out prematurely. first one lost speaker and both of the had poor receptioin and transmission. Thought first was a fluke so gave it another go and the second just took a crap in less than two months not worth the hassle of returning and waiting for it to be returned
customer_reviews.author: YellowIron

customer_reviews.title: Never to but again
customer_reviews.text: What do I say? What a pile of crap. This is the second radio I e received and this one doesn’t work. The power plug was not even screwed in and the quality control sticker for pass is right next to it. Both radios stay miced up when any mic is plugged in. NEVER EVER BUY. Trust me I’m not someone who just leaves negative reviews because I have mother else to do. I just don’t want to see more people frustrated with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: I bought this radio and took it to my tech ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio and took it to my tech and it wasnt worth the money for the fact that they sold a refurbished radio not a new radio
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I can hear you now!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the desert trip we took in February. Comes out clear, no issues with channels. Just adjust the squelch, and other knobs for range. Great and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: kathy brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellant CB radio!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon based pon the Galaxy name.Having had several years eperience with Galaxy radios,I know the quality. This radio is all I expected.It only gives 3.5w.delivered,but as I've many years experience repairing/tuning CBs,it was no problem to peak it out to 15w.Low,30w.High,95% mod. I use the Cobra od.HG M75 power mike set to 50%,Mic Gain 100%, RF-out 25%(about 10w.AM).Roger beep,talk-back off. Using a 102"steel whip on my motourhome,I have talked from southern New Mexico to all corners of the country,and Mexico and Canada.Without any external power. Would I recommend this radio?You know it! But I would advise that peaking out any radio over 5w./12w PEP violates FCC rules Pt.15/95.Do it at your own risk!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: High end CB radio for the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved this radio. The quality of power how it sounded and how it reached out to other was fantastic. My problem was not the radio it was the fact that due to the Dayton tornado I am in a temporary apartment and was having issues with tuning my antenna inside of an apartment. Also what I wanted was the scan feature on a CB radio and the weather. I felt like this radio was a professional piece of equipment and a little too much for a beginner like myself so I returned it for a cheaper model unit the Uniden 980 SSB.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Kenworth, along with new co-phase coaxial cable, and Wilson duel antennas: WOW. This radio is impressive, the prefomance is understated in all the printed materials. The clarity of signal is superior to anything I have ever had in the rig, The sensitivity to received signal is fantastic, this radio does pull in the signal.Galaxy stands behind their products, so this was a no-brain-er.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Bad manufacturing company with no quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Defective out of the box. Not functioning. This was my 2nd try for the same product. Not going to try again. Just wasted my time. Bought a Cobra 29 LTD instead from a truck stop and working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bzsayeed

customer_reviews.title: The Best !
customer_reviews.text: When I think of CB radios there's only one name that come to mind, Galaxy !
customer_reviews.author: Joelh1950

customer_reviews.title: nice radio. SSB takes a few minutes to warm ...
customer_reviews.text: nice radio. SSB takes a few minutes to warm up but then it works just fine! I have talked long distance "skip"on this radio with NO modifications. Recommend that you get Antron 99 antenna here on Amazon and you really do not have to mount it that high so you dont have to offend your neighbors. NICE radio.!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Loud and strong!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my JLUR, we go wheeling in the mountains of southern Nevada, and this radio gets out really well with a strong signal. We get better range than most with only a 4' firestik (properly tuned of course). Did not require much in the way of peaking/tuning from the factory. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio. Quality control is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio. Quality control is an issue. Radio needed aligning. My radio had a very choppy and distorted receive when driving. Turned out to be a cold solder joint on the antenna wire on the SO-239 on the inside of the radio. Takes about 10 minute to warm up to use on SSB. Having said that it has a very sensitive receiver and good audio.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. Has the slightest hum because of the blue led but well worth the price. Had it peaked and a super modulator put in and now it really walks the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Super radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio rocks. And the stock mic is better then an astatic addon mic. Well worth the money. I am gonna buy another for the car. Made the first one base unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne Waters

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy makes a decent radio, or used to anyway.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still testing this thing out, but it seems to work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jhorner

customer_reviews.title: Cool CB
customer_reviews.text: When the lights are turned on bright, which is the setting I like, it causes a buzzing noise. Big flaw, but otherwise I like the CB. Looks and works well.
customer_reviews.author: BigJay

customer_reviews.title: Annoying A/C Hum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today. Has an annoying hum from the face plate. Searching on line says it's a 60z AC hum from the blue face plate. Also says Galaxy is aware and recommends disconnecting an internal connector, which means you loose your channel and freq digits too. Really? They can't fix that at the factory? Also states that it's louder in some radios than others. I really love the look of this radio. Switching to "PA" turns off the face plate and the hum goes away. Trying to decide if I should order another to see if it's still there, or maybe quieter, or go with something else. Bummer :-(
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Used with co-phased 4' Firestik Antenna on a 97 F150, checked SWR -Perfect right out of the box. This thing is beast, the Starlight is Beautiful at night. My first CB and I'm loving it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Allen

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This radio is absolutely awesome! Slight wandering on SSB until it warms up but not a big deal. The meter is large and easy to see. I love the features of this radio, especially the frequency display. Lots of mods available for this radio. It's quite large. That may be a turn off for some folks. I'd buy another in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. I read the reviews and should’ve listened to all the ones that said it wouldn’t last. Had it 2 months and now won’t power up. Garbage zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ovesny

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you need a side band unit.
customer_reviews.text: Good radio. Use it in my truck. Have a farm operation spread out over several miles. Range 10 miles on CB. 15 on side band using base antenna 40 feet high. No upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, I got the unit and it did not work!!! Screwed me out of $21 on refund, guessing I had to eat shipping so not sure if it was seller or amazon. So it will cost you to gamble on a working unit. Lessened learned!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Peters

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product
customer_reviews.text: As usual, you can depend on Galaxy to put out a great product. More bells and whistles than I need, but it really gets the job done. No problems and works well, so how can it get much better?
customer_reviews.author: Retired Marine

customer_reviews.title: Great Mobile or base radio
customer_reviews.text: The only real issue is the very drifty VCO on Sideband. This is not an issue at all using AM channels of course. Put a decent power mic on this Radio and it will do what you expect it to do. This radio works well as a Mobile radio/ or base station radio which is how I have mine setup (for both). Not much else to say as this is a Nice radio and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: John Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Galaxy product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the refurbished version with blue lights and it runs great. Getting about 30 watts no problem. The only thing I noticed was the box was in bad shape. Everytgong else was pristine. I had a 959 before, but wasn't backlit. These radios are bulletproof. Has everything yo need aside from echo, but a good echo power Mic will complete this radio. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: watch for incomplete radios
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this radio, everything turn on but I couldn't transmit or receive anything so I took it to a cb shop and the shop said the radio was incomplete and missing parts, I got it brand new out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received the radio Fast ... Didnt have the chance to hook it up until about 2 months ago ... Already dont work ... Never opened it or had it tuned ... Took it to a shop and was told the the board is shot!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Kopecky

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy LOUD AND PROUD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This radio kicks butt straight out of the box untouched loud punchy clean audio.I get great reports from all over the nation shooting skip!!
customer_reviews.author: Redskin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Have recieved MANY compliments on sound quality from other drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great CB. The side band is picking up transmissions approximately 1500 miles away. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product
customer_reviews.text: Used product. Stripped coax connection where antenna attached. Blown speaker. Could hear, just couldn't understand anyone. And no power cable came with it. Sent it back and it took weeks to receive a refund. Don't buy this radio from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got didn't work, I sent it back and they quickly sent a replacement and it works great, I drive a rock truck which means it's very rough and I have no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio had it peaked and tuned and it reachers farther than any radio I have owned. The display is great and the dimmer works great and love the s meter
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: ... you tighten them up they sink through causing a bad SWR and can cause damage to the radio
customer_reviews.text: I've always had Galaxy radios but have had to radios that the connection for the coax are very cheap and when you tighten them up they sink through causing a bad SWR and can cause damage to the radio
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: An amazing cb, very clear and loud, have any questions about this cb let me know.
customer_reviews.author: readinthakindle

customer_reviews.title: I spent money on a good unit for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this unit and it will not transmit. I purchased a second mic and the new one would not work either. Can anyone tell me if there is a way to exchange. I spent money on a good unit for a reason. Help
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: ... DX-959B Mobile CB radio a while back and I love it has lots of power and the side band ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Galaxy DX-959B Mobile CB radio a while back and I love it has lots of power and the side band works great .Was talking to guy four states away first time I tried it out in my pickup with a K 40 on it all. Worth the extra money JD from Mo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Diisapointed
customer_reviews.text: After 60 days the lights went out. Cant tell what channel I am own. Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: H Bosley

customer_reviews.title: WOWZIE WOWZIE WOWZA
customer_reviews.text: Man, what an awesome radio. Was pretty weak at first with just 2 watts but after a peak and tune. ... This baby sings. Receive is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice CB My husband has enjoyed it and uses it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Penton

customer_reviews.title: Good Radio
customer_reviews.text: Had the radio for two months now everyone says it’s clear and I hear everyone clear i’m using a single 3 foot fire stick antenna so far the radio is working great
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Junk sold me radio that don't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money.piece of junk just got mine hooked it up and nothin.PIECE OF JUNK!!!can't believe Amazon would sell piece junk like this.just stole my money.never again I'm thru!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur hartt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great CB. Lots of great features. Very powerful. I was told I can be heard.
customer_reviews.author: David Trotman

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't receive coming out of box had to take it to the shop and get work on
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W.

customer_reviews.title: not new
customer_reviews.text: I just received my dx959b that was supposed to be new but it wasn't this thing was mounted before and seem's like it doesn't work very good so it's going back
customer_reviews.author: thomas fignar

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy-DX-959 40 Channel AM/SSB Mobile CB Radio with Frequency Counter
customer_reviews.text: received today hooked it up tuned all the knobs in hooked up to a 5/8 skip master aerial had some good reprorts i also tested with a Galaxy Echo Master powered base microphone with even better reports . Great Radio
customer_reviews.author: Andrew upton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and quite possibly the fastest delivery to New ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and quite possibly the fastest delivery to New Zealand I have ever experienced. 100% satisfied customer. 120% will use again
customer_reviews.author: Daryl is not my name

customer_reviews.title: Professional radio with all the whistles and bells
customer_reviews.text: Reports from other operators have all been good, while it drifts on SSB until warmed up it still represents good value. V.E.M.016 AUST
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband....he is a truck driver ... He loves the radio.... Had to get a better mic for it but other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Marshall

customer_reviews.title: great radio, but missing the power cord and the ...
customer_reviews.text: great radio, but missing the power cord and the mic had a wire that wasn’t soldered and the mic circuit board was unplugged inside the radio After that being said radio works great
customer_reviews.author: SQUAREBODY

customer_reviews.title: It has a built in antenna tuner that works great.
customer_reviews.text: All the features of the radio are great, easiest installation of all my radios, it looks great too. Sound quality is loud. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Mark L Singleton

customer_reviews.title: FOR A NEW RADIO THE ONE I GOT THE FREQUENCY ...
customer_reviews.text: FOR A NEW RADIO THE ONE I GOT THE FREQUENCY DID NOT MATCH THE COAX CONNECT IN THE REAR WAS LOSE POORLY MADE IN VIETNAM .... WAS RETURNED !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan321

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: Did not work correctly straight out the box. Quality control is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P.

customer_reviews.title: Was excellent cb however to big in Hawaii as few have ...
customer_reviews.text: Was excellent cb however to big in Hawaii as few have CBS so opted instead for a smaller radio, a cobra.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Leds in the channel window flicker and on channel 19 2 leds are almost out
customer_reviews.author: William Doren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Channels are miss aligned was hoping for way better performance than what it does!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best raio out there
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the radio i wanted and it arrived quickly and safely. Best value for top notch radio
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: To have a product that works
customer_reviews.text: Lest something his messed up inside and I Cannot understand everybody.. Sounds like everybody has a badd mic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kimel

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I like the Galaxy it's a very nice radio my twin Brother bought one
customer_reviews.author: J  Holland

customer_reviews.title: This is only for AM CB talking only and can’t be turned up
customer_reviews.text: This radio works pretty good for AM channel. Distance is decent, too bad you can’t turn it up further.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Garrity

customer_reviews.title: Nails on a chalk board!
customer_reviews.text: Love the original 959 in green. Purchased this for the starlit faceplate. Same radio as the original but the LED lighting in this version causes a awful electric hum. Thought it was a bad radio a friend of mine ordered one at the same time from different seller and same problem. If you can stand a high pitched electrical screech then you will love this radio. Stick with the original green 959 and you wont have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L

customer_reviews.title: Cobra 29 LTD vs Galaxy
customer_reviews.text: Went from a Cobra 29 LTD to this and the range, clarity and adjustment range is hands down a new world
customer_reviews.author: Logan Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio! Everything you will ever need in a radio already built in.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great CB! Was delivered on time and in good shape. Had it peaked and tuned and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished not completed
customer_reviews.text: It's been in the shop since I open the box internal parts mic and speakers inside not connected
customer_reviews.author: Kerry West Sr

customer_reviews.title: Works great right out o f the box
customer_reviews.text: Works great right out o f the box,loud and clear when transmitting and receiving.Will not get any other cb from now on only a galaxy 959
customer_reviews.author: thomas Porter

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if the cb worked, vary disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This radio doesn't work had to buy a new radio. Will not order anything from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Rondeau

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This cb rocks straight out off the box !!!!! I was going to use it in my truck but decided to pair it with an antron 99 and a d104 mike and use it as a base station awesome reports all over the USA in dx land get this cb you won't be disappointed !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Wielgus

customer_reviews.title: The item works great, I was really impressed about the condition it ...
customer_reviews.text: The item works great, I was really impressed about the condition it was in since it was a used cb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio...Having to take it in after a few weeks since its off frequency..

customer_reviews.title: ... only work for two weeks something wrong inside work great lights up that's it galaxy is a great radio ...
customer_reviews.text: It only work for two weeks something wrong inside work great lights up that's it galaxy is a great radio I'm a truck driver use these radio all day long I pay 188.00 dollars for this never see a radio die so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This one of the best cbs i've ever own
customer_reviews.text: This one of the best cbs i've ever own. Clear as a bell, and the blue lights at night are really HOT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rob snead

customer_reviews.title: There is an annoying buzz when the display is on if you turn ...
customer_reviews.text: There is an annoying buzz when the display is on if you turn the display off the buzz goes away
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hutcherson

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Awesome radio had it peaked and tuned and can get out about 10 miles
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CB radio!
customer_reviews.text: This radio met all of my expectations! I am very pleased with my purchase! Go Galaxy, n you can never go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: clay shinn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great radio, still new to me. I love all the functions on it. I recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Rossiter

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio, not a true galaxy.. has no echo or reverbs
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo W.

customer_reviews.title: Second HooRah
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a matched set the base station and this one fir my Jimmy.
customer_reviews.author: Panzerfaust 54

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful radio.
customer_reviews.text: This radio puts out. All my coworkers wish they would have purchased this radio. This beats my old Cobra. Hands down! It should have backlit controls.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and good price. The box was a little damaged but radio still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. Exactly what i was looking for and expected. Looking forward to using it for a long time. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: buddy

customer_reviews.title: other than that the radio looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Radio was not tuned at all and only pushing 2 watts out of box!!! Had to take to a radio tech to get worked on in order for people to hear me, other than that the radio looks and works great
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio right out of the box! TX output tested exactly 4 watts. Getting positive reception reports!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's good, been trying to get it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cb when it worked right. It didn't last 2 weeks in the semi
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: DX 959
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this radio to anyone who wants a quality unit. The only drawback is the lack of an illuminated faceplate.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this radio out of the box. Even the mic seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy CB with SSB
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this CB based on Galaxy's name and reviews of the sound quality and features. Haven't been able to really test the range but the unit gets out there. It is a touch big but has a lot of features. One complaint that I have is that the buttons rattle and overall the knobs seem cheaply made which seems surprising for a unit of this caliber. I read this comment before though so I knew it might be an issue. Still, it is annoying. It is one of the few CBs out there with SSB.
customer_reviews.author: RSP

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: DOA!! I had high expectations for this radio, spent almost $190.00 on this radio, I hook it all up and ......... nothing!!! Just a little pop from the speaker, dead, no lights nothing!!!! What a waste of my money. Date of MFG 06/16 .... Made in Vietnam .... serial #002047
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: You want this radio
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mobile radio. Out of the box features and capabilities are impressive. I use this on am frequency and truly enjoy it. I do want to add a power mic to it but other than that I do not plan to make any serious mods to it. It's a Galaxy it really doesn't need mods unless you want to reach out and "get down". I'm just sitten here reading the mail 4-10.
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Lozada Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I have to go have it worked on right out ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to go have it worked on right out of the box the roger beep stays on all the time even after you turnit offbut this is my 2nd 959
customer_reviews.author: Brian Aldridge

product_meta.title: Galaxy-DX-959 40 Channel AM/SSB Mobile CB Radio with Frequency Counter
product_meta.description: Style:Green LEDs| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingGalaxy CB radios are designed with features that a serious CB operator can appreciate and a new user can easily master. The radio functions are laid out in a driver friendly format essential for ease of use while keeping your eyes focused on the road ahead. Each knob or button controls its own task, minimizing the need to look at a display or cycle through multiple menus. The DX-959 has been a solid performer for more than 15 years. It is at the top of our mobile CB line and is jam packed with big radio features. The Galaxy DX-959 Features AM/SSB and PA Modes. Large, Easy-to-Read Meter with: Power Output Scale calibrated for AM and SSB, Modulation Percentage Scale for use on AM, Signal Strength Scale indicates up to 60 dB over S9, SWR Scale Five-digit Frequency Counter with On/Off Switch Automatic SWR Circuit (no complicated calibration procedure) High SWR Alert Circuit with Warning LED Talkback Circuit with On/Off Switch and Volume Control Variable Power Output Control Variable Dimmer Control with On/Off Switch Roger Beep with On/Off Switch and LED Indicator Noise Blanker and Automatic Noise Limiter Circuits Galaxy Noise Filter (GNF) Circuit for use on weak signals White Meter Lamp Yellow Channel and Frequency LEDs Full-sized Chassis Side Mic Jack Clarifier Control 3-Position Tone Control Switch for Receive Green/Red LED Indicator for RX/TX Receive (RF) Gain Control Mic Gain Control Rear Jacks for External Speaker and Public Address Use Two Year Limited Warranty Dimensions:7-7/8"W x 9-1/4"D x 2-5/16"H (Depth does not include knobs or antenna connector) (Width does not include side mic connection) Radio Weight with Microphone: 4.4 pounds Shipping Weight: 5.8 pounds What's in the box beside the radio: Handheld Microphone, Radio Mounting Bracket and Microphone Mounting Hardware, Power Cord, Owner's Manual
feature_bullets: Large, easy-to-read meter with scales for power output, modulation, SWR and incoming signal
Five-digit frequency counter with large yellow digits , two-digit channel display with larger yellow digits, variable power output control, variable talkback circuit with on/off switch
Automatic SWR circuit and an SWR alert LED, Roger Beep with on/off switch
Variable dimmer control with push switch to turn off the meter lamp and display digits, 3-position tone switch for receive
Proprietary Galaxy Noise Filter (GNF) Circuit reduces noise to aid in the recovery of weak SSB signals
